t: Estée Lauder Announces U.S. Amazon Premium Beauty Store Debut – The Estée Lauder Companies Inc.
s: October 22, 2024 - NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Estée Lauder, the flagship brand of The Estée Lauder Companies Inc., announces its official launch in the U.S. Amazon Premium Beauty store, bringing its high-performance skincare and makeup and legendary fragrances to Amazon shoppers across the country.
